message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think youâ€™ll be really interested in. Given its quality and the current market value, I can offer it to you for $145. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering my budget constraints, would you be willing to accept $130 for the product?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget considerations. I can meet you halfway with an offer at $140. I believe it reflects the value well for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your flexibility; however, my budget is a bit tighter. Would you be willing to settle at $135?
Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer and your flexibility. Would you be willing to accept $135 for the product?
